titles.title: Great Lakes International Air Cargo Superport Authorization Act of 1995
To direct the Secretary of Transportation to make grants for the construction of the Great Lakes International Air Cargo Superport at Youngstown Warren Regional Airport in Vienna, Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 9/29/1995--Introduced. Great Lakes International Air Cargo Superport Authorization Act of 1995 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to make grants to the Western Reserve Port Authority for the construction of runways and taxiways at the Great Lakes International Air Cargo Superport at Youngstown Warren Regional Airport in Vienna, Ohio. Authorizes appropriations.
